channel.title: Introduction to Authentication :: C# Web Development
channel.description: We log into many, many websites every day. The process has become so routine that we expect it to work flawlessly every time. How surprised would you be if you logged into a website and saw a different userâ€™s account info? What if you entered the wrong password and were still let in? What we have come to expect as routine is anything but when we consider the code needed to make it happen.
